tool_description: Soccer odds for all inplay events
name: bet365-soccer
title: bet365-soccer

api_list.name: inplay
api_list.description: get in play events for soccer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/v1/soccer/bet365/inplay"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/v1/soccer/bet365/inplay"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
